English: In the morning, near enemy positions
WE'RE DONE ON THE FARM. NEXT UP: THE ROAD.
THE ROAD IS SECURE. WE CONTINUE TO THE CAMP.
ANTON TO BAZA, MISSION ACCOMPLISHED, WHAT NEXT? OVER.
BAZA TO ANTON, NEW ORDERS. GENERAL RETREAT IS IN EFFECT. TO ALL UNITS: RETREAT TO YOUR BASES AND GET READY FOR EVACUATION.
BAZA TO ALL UNITS: RETREAT! REPORT AT YOUR COMMANDING OFFICERS TO OBTAIN FURTHER INSTRUCTIONS. BAZA OUT.
